alert.note: Alert for Huron; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Tuscola and southwestern Huron Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Caseville to 10 miles south of Au Gres to 8 miles northwest of Sebewaing. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds from off the Bay could knock down tree limbs and damage unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sebewaing, Caseville and Unionville around 645 PM EDT. Owendale around 710 PM EDT. Pigeon and Gagetown around 720 PM EDT. Bad Axe and Elkton around 730 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Pinnebog, Filion, Wisner, Ivanhoe, Bay Port, Bach, Bay Park and Colling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
